Agyeman Badu Akosa (amụrụ na 25 Disemba 1953) bụ onye Ghana na-ahụ maka ọrịa, agụmakwụkwọ, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye na-akọwa mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya. Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi nchịkwa nke Ghana Health Service site na 2002 ruo 2006
Ọ bụ onye otu Convention People's Party ma bụrụ onye Nkrumaist a ma ama nke kwenyere na echiche nke Dr
Kwame Nkrumah onye guzobere ya. O sonyere na onye na-azọ ọkwa onye isi ala nke pati ahụ n'ihu ntuli aka 2008 General ma merie Dr
Paa Kwesi Ndoum. Ọ bụ prọfesọ nke Pathology.  Ọ bụ onye na-akwado nsogbu ndụ.
Agyeman Badu Akosa mụrụ na 25 Disemba 1953 nye Jones Clifford Akosa na Nancy Akosua Nkrabea Akosa na Asante Mampong na mpaghara Ashanti nke Ghana
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Prempeh College na mpaghara Ashanti maka ọkwa GCE ya na ụlọ akwụkwọ nkà na ụzụ dị elu nke Ghana na Takoradi, Western Region maka ọkwa dị elu GCE ya
Ọ gara n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya na Mahadum Ghana ebe ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ ọgwụ, Bachelor of Surgery (MB Bch) na Mahadum Ghana, Legon na 1979 na atụmatụ ntinye aka Defined na Mahadum London, 1983.
